name: Flight Academy
summary: Flight sim, built on the advanced GIN-YOKU system. Instead of serving up airborne battle action, Flight Academy lets players experience what it's like to be a passenger jet pilot. Would-be pilots work their way up from a single-prop A36 plane all the way to a full-sized airliner. The game lets players explore take off and land from multiple Japanese airports and explore the airspace over several islands in the Pacific.
